channel.title: Nerd Time (lol)
channel.description:
Have you ever played on the computer so much and then your mom says
You're always on that computer! you better not be on when i get off of work!!!!
Well, mine has and heres why it sucks : Nerd time, for those of you who don't know what "nerd time" is then this will explain some stuff, have you ever been at school and it was out in 1 hour? i bet that hour took for ever... When your on the computer and your sibling and you switch out every hour or so, i bet it goes quick, that was an example, now heres the nerd time set-up : regular computer-time a day 5 hours + , what it feels like, getting off 3 1/2 hours before expected too. ~~~ Elijah101 ~~~ This was made out of boredom lol, if this is true for you well..then....heres your schedule =P School-Night to day : Stay on computer until 4 AM -> catch 2 hours of sleep -> WAKE UP FEELING SLEEPY-> Use restroom -> u say
Ahh im gonna skip brushing my teeth itss not like i can get a girl anyways! ahh forget about school clothes i have no one to impress
play computer for approx. 30 mins bring your mini-laptop on the school bus-> shake all day at your desk -> go home and you have to use the restroom-> u say
Nevermind that, CLICK INTERNET -> Go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf
As i said, made out of boredom, mods feel free to do whatever with this i don't care =P i was bored lol....! ~~~elijah101~~~

item.title: Nerd Time (lol)
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101
item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:9, topic:291817”]Also, sharing the computer with sibling’s always blew. Fuckin’ one hour time limit was gay.

Lucky I have my own laptop now :rolleyes:[/quote]

Thats good i have a sibling, and shes my sister (Myspace/Yahoo/MsN is what she does =P) i mean i’m on msn and myspace but uhh i do very important stuff…like um…this…

i had a laptop, and my sister and i would switch on-and-off each computers, but mostly i would only use this slow computer because hamachi doesnt work on my laptop but now i’ve learned portforwarding and everything else i need to know so…uhh yah, and my laptop has virus and had something wrong with it so we sent it to the company and they never sent it back! LOL!
